select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(bno,b_title,b_writer,dno,b_contents) values(#{bno},#{b_title},#{b_writer},(select dno from dept where dname=#{dname}),#{b_contents})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rn, bno,b_title,b_writer,b_date,b_updatedate,hit,dno,dname from (select bno,b_title,b_writer,b_date,b_updatedate,hit,d.dno,dname from board b,dept d where b.dno=d.dno order by bno desc) where
rownum<=(#{pageNum}*#{amount})) where rn>((#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount})
select count(*) from board where bno>0
select count(*) from board b, dept d where b.dno=d.dno and bno>0 and b.b_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or d.dname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or b.b_contents like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select b.bno, b.b_date, d.dname, b.b_writer, b.b_title, b.b_contents from board b, dept d where b.bno=#{bno} and b.dno=d.dno
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
